desc: We offer the full range of home decor items and Annie Sloan products, including her world-famous Chalk Paint® and her unique Fabric Collection, as well as a wide selection of Iron Orchid Designs, DIY paint supplies, home decor, expert advice, and fun and informative decorative paint workshops in Greensboro NC.

layout.text: Shop online or stop by our studio to see what's new in IOD.
